name: markdowntofoundry
description: exports markdown to html and allows to adjust the html code. It then allows to export the html to clipboard, as file and to foundry vtt.

scripts.posttest: cp ma*.j* styles.css data.json /opt/Obsidian/ObsidianDev/DSAObsidianDev/.obsidian/plugins/markdowntofoundry && chown -R nobody:sambashare /opt/Obsidian/ObsidianDev/DSAObsidianDev/.obsidian/plugins/markdowntofoundry/*.*
scripts.postwin: copy ma*.j* "E:\Projekte\Obsidian Vault\DEV_B OLD DSA Kampagne\.obsidian\plugins\markdowntofoundry" && copy styles.css "E:\Projekte\Obsidian Vault\DEV_B OLD DSA Kampagne\.obsidian\plugins\markdowntofoundry" && copy data.json "E:\Projekte\Obsidian Vault\DEV_B OLD DSA Kampagne\.obsidian\plugins\markdowntofoundry"
scripts.postwindev: copy ma*.j* "F:\Code_Projekts\Obsidian Vault\DEV_A DSA Kampagne\.obsidian\plugins\markdowntofoundry" && copy styles.css "F:\Code_Projekts\Obsidian Vault\DEV_A DSA Kampagne\.obsidian\plugins\markdowntofoundry" && copy data.json "F:\Code_Projekts\Obsidian Vault\DEV_A DSA Kampagne\.obsidian\plugins\markdowntofoundry"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: CePeU
